error.userHasCredentials: The user already has a password registered
error.pendingUser: The user has not verified their email
error.userEmailAlreadyExists: A user already exists with the email {email}
error.documentAlreadyExists: A user already exists with the document {document}
error.userNotFound: The user has not been found
error.wrongCode: The authentication code is not valid
error.twoFactorAlreadyEnabled: The user has already enabled two-factor authentication
error.twoFactorCodeInvalid: The two-factor authentication code is not valid
error.twoFactorSMSDisabled: The SMS service is not available at the moment
error.twoFactorTypeNotSupported: The two-factor authentication type is not supported

success.register: An email has been sent with instructions to verify your email
success.resetPassword: An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password
success.verifyEmail: Your email has been verified successfully
success.updatePassword: Your password has been updated successfully
success.logout: You have been logged out successfully
success.logoutAll: All sessions have been closed successfully
success.twoFactorEnabled: Two-factor authentication has been enabled successfully
success.twoFactorDisabled: Two-factor authentication has been disabled successfully

guard.noActiveSession: No active session found, please log in
guard.sessionLost: Your session has been lost, please log in
guard.deniedForPermission: You do not have permission to access this resource
guard.deniedOnlyAdmin: You do not have permission to access this resource, only administrators have access

refreshToken.alreadyRevoked: The session has already been revoked

twoFactorOtps.blocked: The user has been blocked for exceeding the limit of authentication attempts with two-factor authentication

auth.email2faEnabled: The two-factor authentication code has been sent by email

error.invalidCode: The recovery code is not valid
error.twoFactorDisabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled for this user
error.usedCode: The recovery code has already been used

success.usedCode: The recovery code has been used successfully

common.notFound: The resource {entity} has not been found
